column2:
Uh-oh! Looks like `LMMS` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you'd like to learn how to use it.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for `LMMS`, and install it.

LMMS is a program that lets you create music on your Hack system.

With a little practice, you can easily sample, remix, make mash-ups, and share them with friends.

We've got some useful tutorials linked in here for you, give them a try!
Click the links for these tutorials to open them in your browser and follow along.

Here's a link to a full playlist of tutorials on how to get started:
https://youtu.be/TrMTlpeSw8Y

Here's a single tutorial that should be great for beginners: 
https://youtu.be/MP7VxyhCkrA
If you want to read the documentation, the wiki is located at https://lmms.io/wiki/index.php
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips.
